com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller - package com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller

com.guidi.customermicroservice.services - package com.guidi.customermicroservice.services
 
create(Customer) - Method in class com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller.CustomerController
This methods receive POST calls from /v1/customer to create a new customer in mongodb.
Customer - Class in com.guidi.customermicroservice.model
This is the entity class responsible to represent a Customer
Customer() - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.model.Customer
 
Customer(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.model.Customer
 
CustomerController - Class in com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller
This is the customer controller class, responsible to process the requests received and return the response.
CustomerController() - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller.CustomerController
 
CustomermicroserviceApplication - Class in com.guidi.customermicroservice
This is the main class, the one responsible to keep the application running.
CustomermicroserviceApplication() - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.CustomermicroserviceApplication
 
CustomerRepository - Interface in com.guidi.customermicroservice.repository
This is the interface responsible to interact with Mongodb.
CustomerService - Interface in com.guidi.customermicroservice.services
This is the interface of the service, all implementation of this interface must implement all methods inside of this interface.
CustomerServiceV1Impl - Class in com.guidi.customermicroservice.services
This is the service class responsible to interact with mongodb across CustomerRepository object.
CustomerServiceV1Impl() - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.services.CustomerServiceV1Impl
 
CustomerServiceV1ImplTest - Class in com.guidi.customermicroservice.repository
This class is responsible to test the service but without a FakeMongoDb, the tests are based on Mock objects with the value expected.
CustomerServiceV1ImplTest() - Constructor for class com.guidi.customermicroservice.repository.CustomerServiceV1ImplTest
